params.name: source

params.description: Target firewall group. See /v1/firewall/group_list.
params.name: FIREWALLGROUPID

params.description: Rule number to delete. See /v1/firewall/rule_list.
params.name: rulenumber

params.description: Target firewall group. See /v1/firewall/group_list.
params.name: FIREWALLGROUPID

params.description: Direction of firewall rules. Possible values: "in".
params.name: direction

params.description: IP address type. Possible values: "v4", "v6".
params.name: ip_type

params.description: Unique identifier for this subscription. These can be found using the v1/objectstorage/list call.

params.name: email

params.description: Unique identifier of LoadBalancer subscription.
params.name: SUBID

params.description: The SSL certificates private key.

params.description: The tag to assign to this server. This tag is shown in the control panel.

params.description: Domain name to update record

params.description: ID of record to update (see /dns/records)
params.name: RECORDID

params.description: Name (subdomain) of record
params.name: name

params.description: Data for this record
params.name: data

params.description: TTL of this record
params.name: ttl

params.description: (only required for MX and SRV) Priority of this record (omit the priority from the data)
params.name: priority

params.description: SSHKEYID of key to update (see /v1/sshkey/list)
params.name: SSHKEYID

params.name: name

params.name: script

params.description: ID of the user to update
params.name: USERID

params.description: New email address for this user
params.name: email

params.description: New name for this user
params.name: name

params.description: New password for this user
params.name: password

params.description: 'yes' or 'no'. If yes, this user's API key will work on api.vultr.com
params.name: api_enabled

params.description: List of ACLs that this user should have.  See /v1/user/list for information on possible ACLs
params.name: acls
